response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it would be an excellent addition to your collection or operations. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a special introductory offer of $7,500. This price is designed to provide you with a significant advantage while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with this outstanding product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 7500}
